title: july 12: an iceberg the size of delaware
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the day that iceberg A68 -- a slab of ice bigger than Delaware -- broke off from the Larsen C Ice Shelf. After, Maia discusses the troubling dimensions of baseball’s “Disco Demolition Night.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
